metadata.title: CVE-2020-23906 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: FFmpeg N-98388-g76a3ee996b allows attackers to cause a denial of service(DoS) via a crafted audio file due to insufficient verification of dataauthenticity.

criterions.comment: vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
